detailsOfAchievement: HARAPANAHALLI IS ONE OF THE MOST BACKWARD AREA IN THE KARNATAKA STATE.THE LIFE OF THE PEOPLE HERE IS DEPENDENT ON RAIN.THERE IS NO TIMELY RAIN AND THIS AREA ALWAYS SUFFERS FROM FAMINE.SO THE PEOPLE HERE MIGRATE TO CITIES FOR AT LEAST 6 MONTHS IN A YEAR.SO THE CIVILIZATION HERE HAS NOT DEVELOPED ACCORDING TO THE EVENTS.AS THE DEVELOPED ZILLA KENDRA MEDIA HAS IGNORED SUCH BACKWARD AREA, OUR ACTIVITIES ARE HOODWINKED BY THE MEDIA PUBLICITY.BUT OUR AREA DOESNâ€™T LACK FROM FOLK CULTURE. HARAPANAHALLI FOR 324 YEARS HAS BEEN CONSIDERED AS THE EXCELLENT, EMINENT, VALIANT ADMINISTRATION IN SOUTH INDIA UNDER PALEGAARA ADMINISTRATION.IT WAS FAMOUS FOR CULTURE, LITERATURE. AS TIME PASSED HARPANAHALLI NOW HAS LOST ITS CULTURAL GRANDEUR AND HAS ATTAINED A SORROWFUL STAGE. EVEN IN THIS CONDITION, TO BRING BACK THE LOST GLORY AND REMINISCENCES OF THE PAST AND TO MAKE HARAPANAHALLI AS THE CULTURAL CENTRE, OUR ADARSHA MAHILA MANDALI FORMED DUE TO THE COMMENDABLE WORK OF WOMEN AND DUE TO THEIR INTRESTS IN DRAMA, MUSIC AND VARIOUS OTHER ARTS IS, AT PRESENT UNDER ITS ORGANISATION, GIVING VARIOUS NEW PERFORMANCES DIRECTED BY EXPERIENCED N.S.D GRADUATES.THE GROUP IN THIS DIRECTION IS WALKING IN LONG STRIDES. THE PLAY HARAPANAHALLI PALEGAARA HIGHLIGHTS THE LOST GLORY OF HARAPANAHALLI HISTORY;ADIKAVI PAMPA`S KULAM, STRIVES TOWARDS VANISHING CASTE SYSTEM IN PRESENT SOCIAL SYSTEM;`KARNABHAARAâ€™ IS AN ANTI-WAR PLAY;`NYAYAKKE JAYAâ€™AND SATYA HARISHCHANDRA TALKS ABOUT HIGHLIGHTING SOCIAL JUSTICE AND STRESSING THAT TRUTH IS EVERLASTING AND EVEREXISTING CHATA IS A PLAY TO CREATE AN AWARENESS AMONG PEOPLE ABOUT SOCIAL EVILS MANUSHYARU BARUTTIDDARE JAAGRATE IS A PLAY WHICH CONTAINS A MESSAGE TO ELDERS OF HOW THEY SHOULD TAKE CARE OF CHILDREN. APPA-MAGA IS A PLAY WHICH DEALS ABOUT COMMON MAN`S MISTAKES, CONTROLLING OFFENCES.THIS PERFORMANCE MADE THE POLICE DEPARTMENT LITTLE FEARFUL. TO DRIVE AWAY THE HESITATION OF WOMEN ABOUT THEATRE AND TO INVOLVE THEM IN THEATRE ACTIVITIES, ADARSHA MAHILA MANDALI CONDUCTS WOMEN THEATRE WORKSHOP EVERY YEAR AND TRAINS THEM ABOUT THEATRE ACTING. ADARSHA MAHILA MANDALI IS THE ONE AND ONLY WOMEN GROUP IN DAVANAGERE ZILLA.THE PLAYS AND PERFORMANCES OF NEW WAVES IS BEING PERFORMED WHICH IS ENRICHING THE NEW IDEAS, CONFLICTS, CRITICISMS AND DISCUSSIONS

detailsOfAchievement: Activities : i)To conduct problem oriented research in all disciplines of agriculture, horticulture, animal husbandry, home science, sericulture, marketing and allied fields including evolving improved varieties or hybrids of crops and animal breeds. ii)To impart training of practical value to farmers, farm women and rural youths. iii)To assist, participate, co-ordinate and collaborate with Government and its institutes or societies in agriculture and rural development activities. iv)To organize, provide technical backup and link SHGs and Joint Liability Groups with Government Agencies for better implementation of various development schemes and programmes. v)To work as Micro-Finance Institutions to facilitate micro credit to SHGs for their socio-economic development. Achievements : (1)Developed 18 Watersheds as model to show enhanced agricultural productivity through natural resource management. (2)Organized both rural and urban poor people into Self Help Groups and Joint Liability Groups. A credit of Rs. 20 crores has been extended through our Micro Finance Programme to take up income generating activities and created self and additional employment for many SHGs & JLGs. (3)Developed agricultural drought proofing models suitable to northern dry zone of Karnataka State involving field crops, horticulture, forestry & fodder crops and grasses. (4)Working as Resource Centre for all agricultural and allied activities in Gadag district. (5)ASF bagged Best Awards from ICAR, New Delhi and NABARD-Karnataka for Best KVK Award and SHG-Bank Linkage programme respectively.

detailsOfAchievement: Jagruthi (meaning â€œAwarenessâ€ in the Kannada language) is working in five talukas, and 368 villages of Bijapur district and is currently partnering with different local non-governmental organizations. The project works for female sex workers, their regular partners, and clients, through peer educators from the sex worker community, change agents like auto drivers and lodge boys etc. The project plays key roles in empowering sex worker communities by creating an environment that not only keeps them safe, but allows them to gain greater control over their lives. Vision : The female sex workers in Bijapur district create an environment free of stigma and discrimination and lead a life of dignity and enjoy the civil rights that they are entitled. Objectives : 1. To prevent HIV-AIDS and STI among the sex workers. 2. To improve the health and economic conditions of poor and marginalized sex workers. 3. Helping the HIV positive sex worker to get care and support. 4. Helping the women to get loan facility from the Govt. 5. To help the women to access legal support when they face problems 6. To prevent the violence on female sex workers by antisocial elements 7. To eradicate Devadasi system 8. To provide vocational training to the sex workers 9. To stop bringing young girls who are below 18 years into sex work. 10. To promote savings habit among women
